front.title: Uniform laws and regulations in the areas of legal metrology and engine fuel quality

author.organization: Physical Measurement Laboratory (National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.))

front.abstract: This handbook compiles uniform laws and regulations developed by the Committee on Laws and Regulations of the National Conference on Weights and Measures (NCWM). This edition contains amendments adopted by the NCWM at its Annual Meeting in 2015. It includes amended regulations on packaging and labeling.
